price: 4. Qui les a nourris au mépris de la faim, et les a rassurés en dépit de la peur !
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alladhī aṭʿamahum min jūʿin waāmanahum min khawfin
